resources.string: Bringing more colour into our lives.

Well, this is could be an interesting one. After learning some Python (a great programming language, by the way) and using it in a variety of diffferent ways, such as in the form of web apps, GUI manipulation and even some very basic machine learning (although I have to say backpropagation prompted me to put a pin in that, at least for the time being), I decided to go on a make an app for Android. Okay, so it\'s Java, not Python, and sure, I would like to learn some Kotlin along the way, but anyhoo, here\'s to my next slightly larger project of creating an app that can act as a sort of diary of colours, where you can describe each day as the colour you are currently feeling. There will also be a public screen, that will show a collective colour diary for all the users. Yes… users… may even get some Python in there with a Django REST back-end! Anyway, check out my GitHub at \n https://github.com/Carkzis
